All Implemented Interfaces:
AdminableService, ApplicationLogging, ComponentNameResolver, java.util.EventListener, InsertableServlet, NameContextBindingListener, NameContextElement, NameResolver, PipelineableServlet, Service, ServiceListener, javax.servlet.Servlet, Validateable
public class CommerceProfileRequestServlet
extends ProfileRequestServlet

This class is a subclass of the ProfileRequestServlet which performs any commerce specific actions when a user is auto-logged in.
